member.name: D3D11_AUTHENTICATED_CONFIGURE_INPUT
member.summary: Contains input data for the method.

member.name: D3D11_AUTHENTICATED_CONFIGURE_INPUT.omac
member.summary: A structure that contains a Message Authentication Code (MAC) of the data. The driver uses AES-based one-key CBC MAC (OMAC) to calculate this value for the block of data that appears after this structure member.

summary.para: A GUID that specifies the command. The following GUIDs are defined.

listheader.description:
Associates a cryptographic session with a decoder device and a Direct3D device.
Input data:

Sets the level of encryption that is performed before protected content becomes accessible to the CPU or bus.
Input data:

Initializes the authenticated channel.
Input data:

Enables or disables protection for the device.
Input data:

Enables a process to open a shared resource, or disables a process from opening shared resources.
Input data:

member.name: D3D11_AUTHENTICATED_CONFIGURE_INPUT.hChannel
member.summary: A handle to the authenticated channel. To get the handle, call the method.

member.name: D3D11_AUTHENTICATED_CONFIGURE_INPUT.SequenceNumber
member.summary: The query sequence number. At the start of the session, generate a cryptographically secure 32-bit random number to use as the starting sequence number. For each query, increment the sequence number by 1.
